nodes.text: Hangar 9-4 served as a hangar bay in a Umbaran airbase and was used during the Clone Wars.

Around 21 BBY, a battle took place on Umbara and this hangar was part of an airbase that was resupplying the Umbaran capital. Sometime during the battle the airbase was captured by the 501st Legion under the command of General Pong Krell and this hangar was used by ARC trooper Fives, Clone troopers Hardcase and Jesse for pilot training to destroy a Separatist Supply ship. This hangar was partially destroyed as a result of the flying lesson.
